headline: STOKES VACUUM EDWARDS MICROVAC VACUUM PUMP
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump

Manufacturer Stokes Vacuum
Model Microvac 212
Pumping Speed 138.0 CFM (3,899.5 l/m)

Exhaust Flange ASA 50.8 mm (2.000 in)
Duty--Service Corrosive
Ultimate Total Pressure with Gas Ballast 2.00E-2(En) torr (2.67E-2 mbar)
Ultimate Total Pressure without Gas Ballast 2.50E-2(En) torr (3.33E-2 mbar)
Direct Drive No
Motor Horsepower 7.5 HP
Rotational Speed 1,760 RPM
Other Information Water cooled
